images.copyright: Apples ready for harvest, Minnesota (© Tammi Mild/Getty Images)
images.title: Sweet on science
images.caption: Apples ready for harvest in Minnesota
images.desc: In Minnesota, autumn carries more than crimson leaves—it brings the crisp promise of apple season. From mid-August through late October, orchards across the state open their rows of Honeycrisp, Haralson, and dozens of other cultivars, each bred for flavor, resilience, and charm. Today's image captures that moment: branches heavy with ripe fruit, ready for harvest.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
